facts.amosi chipasi: Amosi Chipasi is a notable person locally.
facts.elona musk: Elon Musk is the CEO of Tesla and SpaceX.
facts.world's best player 2009: Lionel Messi won the FIFA World Player of the Year 2009.

jokes: Why did the computer show up at work late? It had a hard drive!
Why did the smartphone need glasses? It lost its contacts.
Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
